Key:
(It all happened while I was on a date. I had
said that she could spend the night there when
Kotori was gone. She took me very seriously.)

Then, Kotori-chan won't be back until
tomorrow?

Yeah. She said she's spending the night at a
friend's house. I thought it'd be good for her
to have a change of pace, so I sent her off.

(Since they're letting her stay at the house,
I wanted to gift something as a "Thank You," but
Kotori dismissed it, calling it embarrassing.)

I felt like a parent with a rebellious daughter.
...Hey, Miku, are you listening?

Hm, I see. So Kotori-chan's not home today.
Which means no problems for us.

Um, Miku-san? This is a random question,
but what do you mean by "no problems"...?

You know what I mean! Spending the night
at your house, darling!!
Wha? Hey, let's calm down.

I couldn't possibly calm down! Darling, you
said it'd be fine when Kotori-chan wasn't
around, right?

Err, no! Please, keep it down, okay?
Everyone's listening!
My, my. Did you hear that?

Kids these days really are something. And here,
of all places!

He thinks himself some kind of womanizer.
What a creep.

(I could hear quiet laughter from people around
us... Maybe even some terrible insults, too.)

I'm begging you. Please don't say that stuff
out loud. And you're an idol, so you should be
more aware of your surroundings.

I-I'm sorry, b-but I want to stay the night at
your house, darling.

(Well, I do remember saying something to
that effect. If I think about it, it's less of a
problem if Kotori isn't home.)
Er, but Miku, ordinarily this is...
Hmph! You promised me, didn't you?
(Oogh. When she gives me those eyes...)

All right. You win, but I won't be able to
offer you much in terms of hospitality.
Aww, darling. I love you so much!

(Oogh. I crumbled in only two seconds. I'm
such a sucker for her.)
Yaaay, I'm so happy!

Well, it's fine, but... is that really something
to be happy about?

But I'm staying the night, silly. I've heard
Tohka-chan's done it before, is that true?

Well that happens from time to time, like
when a Spirit's apartment is unlivable or
something...

(I see. Miku's my girlfriend, and I remember her
saying she wanted to do things that the rest of
the girls have done, too.)

Okay. If that's the case, then I'll give you a
proper reception. Let's break for today, and
meet at my place. Don't come empty-handed, okay?
Yes, I understand. No take-backsies, okay?

I know. I couldn't do that to you after seeing
how happy it makes you. And I'm always happy
when my girlfriend's happy.
Tee hee hee. Darling. I love you.

(Still, it'll be a sleepover without Kotori.
Is that really okay?)

Now then. That settles prep for dinner. I
ended up making quite the feast, didn't I?
I hope Miku likes it.

She should be here any minute now, huh?
I told her to come over as soon as she was
ready, but she's taking her time.

If Kotori were here, I'm sure she'd say,
She's a girl, so of course she'll take time
getting ready!" Hahaha…

(...I know she's only a little late, but I'm
getting nervous. No one else is here for
sure, right?)
Whoa. That surprised me. Perfect timing...
(Okay, just calm down. Take deep breaths...)
All right, here I go.
Opening it now!
Welcome, Miku. Make yourself at home.
U-Um, I hope I'm not intruding.
...? Go ahead. Come inside.
Y-Yes!

Dinner will be ready soon.
Oh, that's right. Miku...

Wh-Wh-What is it!
Please wait, darling.
My heart isn't ready yet!

Er. I was just going to ask if you wanted
slippers.

...Huh? Oh. S-Slippers, yes. T-Thank you
for being so attentive.
Of course. I mean, it's not much.

(Well then. I wonder if something's wrong.
She's acting a little strange.)

Hey, Miku? If you're not feeling well or
something, we can do this another time.

Th-That's not the case at all. I'm feeling
perfectly well.
I-I see. Then, that's good. For now, come inside.

(Although something with Miku seemed off,
for the moment, we decided to go ahead with
dinner.)

I still have to plate everything, but the food
should be done soon, so go ahead and have
a seat.

Wow. Did you prepare all of this yourself,
darling?

Yup. Just wanted to give you a reception.
I thought I'd treat you, but then I kinda
went overboard.

(I might've gone too far, as I ended up making
a full-course meal. Parboiled and chilled pork
shabu, pickled jellyfish, and potato salad.)

(A consomme-esque soup, spring rolls, and the
main dish, gratin, baking in the oven. I'm not
sure even I can finish all this food.)

I just thought I'd whip something up quickly
while I was waiting, but I got ahead of myself.
Miku, is there anything you don't like?

If it's something you made, darling, then
I'll eat anything!

I-I see. I'm glad to hear you say that. Well,
feel free to eat as much as you'd like.
U-Um... I actually made something, as well.
What do you mean?

I thought this would make for a perfect
late night snack.

(As she said this, Miku pulled out a small
package.)

Ohh, sandwiches, huh? You made it even
though you didn't have much time?
However, it might have been unnecessary.
That's not true. The more, the merrier.
(Either way, we decided to start eating.)

Firstly, I think I'll try the sandwiches you
made, Miku!
Erm, um, darling. You can have that afterwards.

No can do. Especially since you made them.
Let me try it... *nom*.
H-How is it...?

Mm, it's delicious. The butter on the bread
was a nice touch, too. Have you been practicing?

(This isn't a nice thing to say, but Miku never
struck me as someone who was good at cooking,
which means she had to have practiced a ton.)

Um. I just wanted to be worthy of being
your significant other, darling.
I'm so glad you think it's delicious.

(I see. That explains why she was acting so
weird earlier.)
Miku, thank you.

Here. Please eat some of the food I made.
There's a lot, so have whatever you want.
Okaaay, I'll help myself～!

Whew. It feels like I've eaten a ton, but
there's a lot leftover.
Yes, but it was quite delicious.

That's good. Well worth all the effort of
making it.

(Well, that leaves the other half for leftovers,
so I'll just consolidate what's left and eat it
tomorrow.)

Now then. Guess it's time for a bath and then
bedtime.

Aw, already? It's still only 8 o'clock. I'm
not a grandma.

Well, it's true that it might be a little early
to get to bed. Hmmm, then should we play
a game? Or maybe watch some TV?

(It was a suddenly planned sleepover, so
there wasn't anything in particular prepared.
We could take a look at Kotori's movie shelf.)

U-Um, darling. If that's the case, I have one
request.

Oh, what is it? Any suggestions? Nothing's
planned, so I'm all ears.

R-Really, anything goes? You wouldn't take
it back, would you, darling?

Er, well, what I meant was you could suggest
anything you wanted, but...

(Huh. Why am I getting the strangest sense
of déjà vu...?)
Anything goes, yes?
Y-Yeah. What do you suggest, Miku?
(And so, what had ended up happening was...)
Um, darling. Why are you closing your eyes?

N-No reason at all. Just got some water in
my eyes.
I see. Then, please take a look over here.
Y-Yeah. R-Right...
(Agh, screw it!)
(To think I'd end up in this situation...)
Th-That's... I knew it was good, but wow...
Is something the matter～?
N-No, it's nothing!
(Shoot. I was being super obvious...)
I-I'll get out as soon as I'm warmed up.

Aww, let's take our time. You just got in,
after all. If you don't properly warm up,
you'll get chilly, don't you know?

(Miku's request was for us to take a bath
together. I thought it'd be a big issue, but...)

In the end, I got pushed into it. Now,
here I am...

(A-Anyway, I better get out of the bath fast,
or my blood's gonna rush to my head.)
Um, darling? I want to ask you something.
Wh-What is it?
I don't know how to run the hot water.
Oh, just turn the handle right there.

Um, I'm not sure if I can do it. Could you
show me how?

(Sh-Show you how...?! But if I do that, no
matter what, I'll see Miku's bare body.
Besides, who can't run hot water...?)
Um, please hurry.

(Urgh, damn it! I made up my mind and stood
up. I'll just avert my eyes.)

If you turn the handle like this, then you'll get
hot water. To stop it, turn it the other way.
Okay then...
Yaaay! Thank you!
Hey Miku, don't grab my arm. I-It's dangerous!
Aw. You're so stingy, darling.

(Whew. Somehow, she let me go. Looks like
I can return to the bathtub. That's a relief.)
Um, darling...?
Gah! Wh-What is it this time?
Could you please wash my back?

R-Right, your back.
...Your back?!

(When she says her back, does she really
mean HER back?! Like, the other side of her
body?!)

Um, I couldn't hear you well, Miku. Did you
say bath soap or something?

How could you mistake back with bath soap?
Come on, any day now.

(With this, Miku gently pushed her hair away,
 exposing her back... I unblinkingly watched
the troublesome gesture. I was transfixed.)
Will you, please～?
...Yes, gladly.
(Shoot, I answered unconsciously.)
Then, please do so～.

(Miku waited while showing her back. If I
 make her wait too long, she might catch a
cold, so I guess I'll just have to steel myself.)

Alright, first I'll wash it with soap,
but let me know if something happens.
You're going to wash me with that sponge?

Yeah.
Otherwise I can't get the soap to foam, right?

You could just use your hands to spread it on
me directly, you know～?

Gah, I couldn't possibly do that!
Just drop it, I'm going to start.

(Oogh, she's so smooth. Anyway, I'll try to
wash her without shaking too much.)
Aaaah. Darling, you're so intense...

Hey, don't make any weird noises! I'm not
scrubbing that hard.

The place you touched me is so very
hot, darling.
I'm washing you with hot water after all!

Hee hee. You're very good at this. It's
unbelievably soothing.

(Whew. All that's left is to rinse her off with
hot water. I did it. I fulfilled her request.)
Miku, I'm going to rinse you with hot water.
Yes, please do.

(Oogh. Miku's back, which was covered in soap,
is visible again... This is bad. I stared right
at it. Her flushed skin is so sexy.)
(I-I can't handle this anymore... I... I—!)
Darling? What's the matter, darling?
Miku, I... I can't!
K-Kyaaaa...? Umm, umm, darling, darling?!
Sorry, I... can't do this.

(My vision went red for a brief moment,
but darkness soon followed.)

(As I was losing consciousness, a beautiful
vision appeared before me.)

I never thought I'd get dizzy and pass out
from a bath in my own house...
Um, I'm sorry. Darling, it was my fault.

No, you're not at fault, Miku. I'm shocked
that I fainted. I wonder if I'm just tired...

(Or it's possible that seeing Miku's figure
in its natural state was too much to bear.)

(Good thing I laid out the futons ahead of
time. We planned to sleep together in the
living room.)

Sorry about everything, with you coming
here to stay over and whatnot...

Darling, I'm the one who should apologize.
I've made so many selfish requests.
Miku...
But, I had fun.
I'm sorry, myself.
But, I had fun.
Huh?

I had fun. Just spending time with you, Miku.
So please don't apologize.
Darling...
Huh.

Hee hee hee. Then, let me apologize in my
own sweet way.
Am I on your lap, Miku?

Try not to move too much. You just fainted,
after all.
Right...

(It's so soft, I might just pass out again,
but I'll keep that to myself.)
I feel like I'm going to fall asleep...
Yes, that's all right. Just rest, darling.
R-Right...

(As I was drifting to sleep, something soft
touched against my forehead. Then, I was
overcome with happiness.)

I'm the one who should apologize. I'm a
disgrace.

Fainting in the bathroom and being nursed
by my girlfriend. I can't believe it.

That's not true at all. You have a terrific
personality, darling. A wonderful person. No
matter what anyone says, you're number one.
Miku, thank you...

Well, I feel bad for saying this, but let's call
it a night. It's a little early. Is that okay with
you?
Yes, let's.
Um, darling...
Hm, what is it?

Even after turning off the lights, can we
talk until we fall asleep?
Yeah, of course. To our heart's content.

(And so, we stayed up for a long while,
sharing stories.)
